title: The 2024 BaT Awards—Congratulations to Our Winners!
description: One more round of congratulations to all of the winners of the 2024 BaT Awards!  Success Story of the Year went to joeinbcs for Honest John’s Eldorado Charity Auction People’s Choice Listing of the Year is this Special-Roadster-Style 1934 Mercedes-Benz 500 K listed by 500K36. Most Valuable Commenter for 2024 is Stratos! Video of the Year was won by Shervinator for this ex-Bell System Ford Econoline display van. Photo Gallery of the Year goes to Ruxton for his gallery of this full-size Chaparral 2E display model. The Cognoscenti Award for 2024 goes to ValiantJim!
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Learn more about The 2024 BaT Awards—Congratulations to Our Winners! on Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online.

html:
One more round of congratulations to all of the winners of the 2024 BaT Awards! 

  • Success Story of the Year went to joeinbcs for Honest John’s Eldorado Charity Auction
  • People’s Choice Listing of the Year is this Special-Roadster-Style 1934 Mercedes-Benz 500 K listed by 500K36.
  • Most Valuable Commenter for 2024 is Stratos!
  • Video of the Year was won by Shervinator for this ex-Bell System Ford Econoline display van.
  • Photo Gallery of the Year goes to Ruxton for his gallery of this full-size Chaparral 2E display model.
  • The Cognoscenti Award for 2024 goes to ValiantJim!

Well done, all of you!

ORIGINAL POST:

Image: Le Mans, 1954 via Motorsports Images

Each January, we set aside time to look back on the previous year and celebrate the best of BaT with our annual awards. This is where you, the members of the BaT community, have a chance to come together around your favorite listings, galleries, videos, stories, and personalities. These awards are a way for us to recognize and reward the people, listings, and stories that impacted us the most in 2024.

We have a total of six BaT Awards for 2024 inlcuding the Cognoscenti Award, now in its third year, honoring the contributions of those especially knowledgeable commenters who generously share their wisdom and time with us on a daily basis.

  • Success Story of the Year
  • People’s Choice Listing of the Year
  • Most Valuable Commenter
  • Video of the Year
  • Photo Gallery of the Year
  • The Cognoscenti Award

Want to stay connected to the BaT Awards or see past winners? Just click the bell icon on the BaT Awards page, and you’ll get an email each time a new awards post goes live!

We wanted to give everyone a bit of time to think about their favorites from the past year. The nomination period will begin today as each category posts, and will close on Sunday. Here is the full schedule for the 2024 BaT Awards:

  • Tuesday, January 7 through Sunday, January 12: Nominations and voting for all six awards
  • Monday, January 13: Finalists announced
  • Monday, January 13 through Wednesday, January 15: Final voting for all six awards
  • Thursday, January 16: Winners and prizes announced

Each award will have its own site post, where votes for that category should be cast in the comments. This is the second year that our prizes are underwritten by our partners at Michelin USA—each winner will receive a set of new Michelin or BFGoodrich tires!

A few rules to mention:
1) Past winners are not eligible (we’re looking at you, previous Photo Gallery of the Year winners!).
2) Please limit your votes to one per category. (For those of you who forget, we’ll count only your first vote toward each award).
3) Feel free to ask friends and family to participate, but please play fair: don’t spam your mailing list (if you’ve got one) or vote with burner accounts. We will be able to tell. We have ways…

We’re looking forward to a great award season this year!
